member.name: P:Microsoft.TabletPC.Samples.InkSecureSignature.InkSecureSignatureData.AcquiredSignatureStartOn
member.summary: Gets or sets the timestamp when signature creation began.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TabletPC.Samples.InkSecureSignature.InkSecureSignatureData.BiometricEncryptionCompletedOn
member.summary: Gets or sets the timestamp when signature data was received back from the biometric encryption provider.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TabletPC.Samples.InkSecureSignature.InkSecureSignatureData.BiometricEncryptionSubmittedOn
member.summary: Gets or sets the timestamp when signature data was submitted to the biometric encryption provider.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TabletPC.Samples.InkSecureSignature.InkSecureSignatureData.EncryptedBiometricData
member.summary: Gets or sets the encrypted biometric data.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TabletPC.Samples.InkSecureSignature.InkSecureSignatureData.HardwareInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets hardware information for the computer that created the signature.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TabletPC.Samples.InkSecureSignature.InkSecureSignatureData.InkWashedSignature
member.summary: Gets or sets serialized Strokes for the signature that have been altered to strip pressure information.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TabletPC.Samples.InkSecureSignature.InkSecureSignatureData.InkSecureSignature
member.summary: Gets or sets the original Strokes for the signature.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TabletPC.Samples.InkSecureSignature.InkSecureSignatureData.SignerAcceptedOn
member.summary: Gets or sets the timestamp for the Accept button click.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TabletPC.Samples.InkSecureSignature.InkSecureSignatureData.SignersName
member.summary: Gets or sets the text name of the signer.

member.name: T:Microsoft.TabletPC.Samples.InkSecureSignature.InkSecureSignatureData
member.summary: Provides storage for InkSecureSignature data.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TabletPC.Samples.InkSecureSignature.InkSecureSignature.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the InkSecureSignature class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TabletPC.Samples.InkSecureSignature.InkSecureSignature.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases resources used by the InkSecureSignature object.
member.param: Set to true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: E:Microsoft.TabletPC.Samples.InkSecureSignature.InkSecureSignature.Signed
member.summary: Occurs when the signature has been fully signed.
member.param: The source InkSecureSignature object for this event.
The EventArgs object that contains the event data.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TabletPC.Samples.InkSecureSignature.InkSecureSignature.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets an XML document string containing the entire state of the control.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TabletPC.Samples.InkSecureSignature.InkSecureSignature.SignersNameCaption
member.summary: Gets or sets the override to the default "Signer's Name:" label caption.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TabletPC.Samples.InkSecureSignature.InkSecureSignature.SignatureComplete
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the signature has been completed.
member.remarks: After the signature is accepted, this property is true, and it cannot be changed back to false. This would enable the modification of the signature after acceptance.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TabletPC.Samples.InkSecureSignature.InkSecureSignature.Print(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Prints the signature.
member.param: The Graphics context to print to.
The top left corner of the print area.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TabletPC.Samples.InkSecureSignature.InkSecureSignature.Reset
member.summary: Clears signature data to reset the control.

member.name: T:Microsoft.TabletPC.Samples.InkSecureSignature.InkSecureSignature
member.summary: User control for safely collecting an ink signature.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TabletPC.Samples.InkSecureSignature.BiometricEncryptionProviderForInk.Encrypt(Microsoft.TabletPC.Samples.InkSecureSignature.InkSecureSignatureData)
member.summary: Encrypt the signature data.
member.param: An InkSecureSignatureData object containing a signature and its metadata.

member.name: T:Microsoft.TabletPC.Samples.InkSecureSignature.BiometricEncryptionProviderForInk
member.summary: Encrypts the entire InkSecureSignatureData object, generates washed Ink, and blanks out the original Ink.
